policing.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the way that the police are used to keep control over a particular area and to protect people and property
policing.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The community is demanding a less aggressive style of policing.
policing.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the way that an industry or activity etc is controlled in order to make sure that people obey the rules
policing.translation[0].definitions[1].e: In the last twenty years the industry has had no oversight or policing.
